project.description: eTajer is a b2b and b2c application created for businesses that primarily sell goods and want to build a fully commerce-enabled Web presence. It has an easy-to-use commerce wizard, store editing and management, catalog maintenance, order management as well as back-office management tools. Powered by ATG, eTajer’s other functions include Campaign Manager, Order tracking and a fully secure payment system.
